attributes.title: HE MADE MY FISHY DIEğŸ ğŸ’”
attributes.review: This app is making my life go haywire. It all started when I was walking my fish ğŸ  and I had the best thought - what better way to support my favorite racist president than to download his app? As a Trump supporter, I was SOOOO excited to download this app that I let go of my fishâ€™s leash and he got ran over by a car ğŸ’”RIP BubblesğŸ’”. I cried and cried but then I realized that if I didnâ€™t press â€œdownloadâ€ then my fish will have died for nothing, so I finally downloaded it. Itâ€™s what Bubbles would have wanted. But to my surprise, it wouldnâ€™t download after a few minutes ğŸ•°. I waited and waited. I waited some more. I waited... waited waited waited until, 97 hours and three dead fish later, it FINALLY downloaded. I immediately opened the app and came to find that it wanted my phone number. I was about to enter my number when I asked myself, why would this old orange ğŸŠchild predator want my number? Iâ€™m an underaged girl and my mom would punch his spray tanned face. Nevertheless, I gave my number. All was good in the infected, biased world until I got a text from â€œUNKNOWNâ€. I assumed it was the funeral director (Mr. Deadfish) Iâ€™d hired for Bubblesâ€™s funeral, so I tapped the notification. To my surprise it wasnâ€™t Mr. Deadfish. The text was asking me to come to the White House for a Trump2020 celebratory dinner, and boy was I honored. The day of the dinner rolled around and I was SUPER HAPPY! I wore a red gown (for MAGA) and blue heels (for blue lives matter), and I looked amazing if I do say so myself. I went to the White House to find Donald ğŸŠ, Malaria ğŸ¦ , and Barron ğŸ¥µ Trump all lined up outside. Malaria was scolding Barron for flirting with me, and Trump ğŸŠ took my hand, leading me inside. We came to the dining area and I saw an entire feast! I was so excited but it was short lived as I remembered that Iâ€™m vegetarian and lactose intolerant. I politely mentioned it to Donald, who started having a mental breakdown, eating all the forks and napkins. He kept banging his head into his plate, calling himself a failure for not knowing my eating restrictions. He proceeded to tell me Santa wasnâ€™t real. Malaria started cosplaying, and Barron and I stood there awkwardly. Barron and I ended up ditching them, and went to Panera instead where I got a Caesar salad. In the following weeks, I noticed some strange things going on. The Trump app would make my Siri start babbling about the Kardashians. My teddy bears would start harassing me. It got to the point where I was scared to cuddle them at night. If that wasnâ€™t traumatic enough, my toes got this black and yellow rash that spelled out, and I quote: â€œTrump is a racist, sexist, xenophobic, homophobic, transphobic child predator and we need the Obamas backâ€. Weird, huh? The app also started making my eyes turn red, and I would cry randomly throughout the day. I WOULDNT STOP SNEEZING, EITHER! Then my entire family got dysentery. DO NOT GET THIS APP (or vote Trump 2020 for that matter), OR BAD LUCK WILL FOLLOW!

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review:
After listening to the amazing, well spoken president elect Donald J. Trumpâ€™s well written speech, probably the best Iâ€™ve ever heard, about his prowess in the field of windmills, I was ecstatic to hear that he had his own app on the iOS AppStore. EXCITED. I anticipated a lot of trivia about windmills, and had hoped to learn a thing or two about WINDMILLS. Soon I would learn more about windmills from the expert, as he had claimed to know more about windmills than anyone else. You can IMAGINE my disappointment when I opened the app. SAD. To start off, the app asked for my phone number. CREEPY. But I choked it over, and the app asked to install â€œPasta Salad Recipes 2020.â€ CONFUSING. I pressed install, and continued on to the app. I was NOT READY for what came next. 
While I was expecting facts about windmills, all I got was PASTA SALAD RECIPES. Not cool. One of the pasta salad recipes contained gluten, and while I was preparing it I ingested the gluten, and had stomach pain for WEEKS. PAINFUL. I decided that I would no longer prepare the pasta salad the president begged me to make. I uninstalled the app. As soon as I uninstalled the Trump 2020 app, the pasta salad app filled my screen. I could not press the home button, I was stuck on a loading screen for 39 hours. My phone rang, it was the president. He said to me â€œmake the pasta salad.â€ I said â€œno, please, it makes me sick,â€ but he was persistent. He claimed that his hands were too big to make the pasta salad himself and that he required assistance. PATHETIC. I hung up, only for my phone to be bombarded and spammed with more phone calls and texts from Trump asking me to make his pasta salad. This app is malicious, and will not stop until you prepare a pasta salad adequate enough for the POTUS. Please donâ€™t download, I BEG you
